languages.text: "В смехотворных количествах — остатки, скопившиеся в сливных цистернах и не подлежащие занесению в учетные летописи. Была бы там настоящая кража корабельных ресурсов, я бы уже наказала причастных, Лорд-капитан". {n}В последней фразе сквозит легкое сожаление.{/n}

"The amount of residue accumulated in the drainage tanks was so laughably small that it was not even worth recording. If there were any real misappropriation of the ship's resources happening here, I would have already punished those involved, Lord Captain." {n}The last sentence carries a faint note of regret.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В смехотворных количествах — остатки, скопившиеся в сливных цистернах и не подлежащие занесению в учетные летописи. Была бы там настоящая кража корабельных ресурсов, я бы уже наказала причастных, Лорд-капитан". {n}В последней фразе сквозит легкое сожаление.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "A laughable amount of residue accumulated in the drain tanks and not subject to record keeping. If there was a real misappropriation of the ship's resources, I would have punished those involved by now, Lord Captain." {n}The last sentence carries a faint note of regret.{/n}

If there were any real misappropriation of the ship's resources happening here, I would have already punished those involved, Lord Captain." {n}The last sentence carries a faint note of regret.{/n}

languages.text: «La cantidad de residuos acumulada en los tanques de desagüe era tan irrisoria que no merecía la pena registrarla. Si se estuviera cometiendo una verdadera malversación de los recursos de la nave, ya habría castigado a los implicados, Lord Capitán». {n}Su última frase tiene un toque de tristeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The amount of residue accumulated in the drainage tanks was so laughably small that it was not even worth recording. If there were any real misappropriation of the ship's resources happening here, I would have already punished those involved, Lord Captain." {n}The last sentence carries a faint note of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La cantidad de residuos acumulada en los tanques de desagüe era tan irrisoria que no merecía la pena registrarla. Si se estuviera cometiendo una verdadera malversación de los recursos de la nave, ya habría castigado a los implicados, Lord Capitán». {n}Su última frase tiene un toque de tristeza.{/n}

languages.text: 「排水タンクに蓄積されていた残留物の量は、記録する価値もないほど、笑ってしまうほどに少なかったんです。もし本当にここで船の資源の不正流用があったのなら、私は既に関係者を処罰していることでしょう、ロード・キャプテン」{n}言葉の終わりには、かすかな後悔の念が感じられた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The amount of residue accumulated in the drainage tanks was so laughably small that it was not even worth recording. If there were any real misappropriation of the ship's resources happening here, I would have already punished those involved, Lord Captain." {n}The last sentence carries a faint note of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「排水タンクに蓄積されていた残留物の量は、記録する価値もないほど、笑ってしまうほどに少なかったんです。もし本当にここで船の資源の不正流用があったのなら、私は既に関係者を処罰していることでしょう、ロード・キャプテン」{n}言葉の終わりには、かすかな後悔の念が感じられた。{/n}

languages.text: “钷素罐里残存的钷素少得可怜，甚至根本不值得记录。如果他们真的犯下了盗窃舰船资源的罪行，我早就对相关人员进行惩处了，舰长大人。”{n}说出最后这句话的时候，她的语气带着一丝遗憾的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The amount of residue accumulated in the drainage tanks was so laughably small that it was not even worth recording. If there were any real misappropriation of the ship's resources happening here, I would have already punished those involved, Lord Captain." {n}The last sentence carries a faint note of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “钷素罐里残存的钷素少得可怜，甚至根本不值得记录。如果他们真的犯下了盗窃舰船资源的罪行，我早就对相关人员进行惩处了，舰长大人。”{n}说出最后这句话的时候，她的语气带着一丝遗憾的意味。{/n}

languages.text: "Die Menge an Rückständen in den Abflusstanks war so lächerlich gering, dass sich nicht einmal die Messung lohnte. Gäbe es eine tatsächliche Fehleinschätzung der Schiffsressourcen, hätte ich die Verantwortlichen längst bestraft, Lord Captain." {n}Im letzten Satz schwingt ein Hauch von Bedauern mit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The amount of residue accumulated in the drainage tanks was so laughably small that it was not even worth recording. If there were any real misappropriation of the ship's resources happening here, I would have already punished those involved, Lord Captain." {n}The last sentence carries a faint note of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Menge an Rückständen in den Abflusstanks war so lächerlich gering, dass sich nicht einmal die Messung lohnte. Gäbe es eine tatsächliche Fehleinschätzung der Schiffsressourcen, hätte ich die Verantwortlichen längst bestraft, Lord Captain." {n}Im letzten Satz schwingt ein Hauch von Bedauern mit.{/n}

languages.text: « La quantité de résidus accumulés dans les réservoirs de drainage était si risible qu'elle ne valait même pas la peine d'être enregistrée. Si j'avais décelé la moindre trace de détournement de ressources, j'aurais immédiatement puni les coupables, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Il vous semble deviner comme une pointe de regret dans cette dernière phrase.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The amount of residue accumulated in the drainage tanks was so laughably small that it was not even worth recording. If there were any real misappropriation of the ship's resources happening here, I would have already punished those involved, Lord Captain." {n}The last sentence carries a faint note of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La quantité de résidus accumulés dans les réservoirs de drainage était si risible qu'elle ne valait même pas la peine d'être enregistrée. Si j'avais décelé la moindre trace de détournement de ressources, j'aurais immédiatement puni les coupables, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Il vous semble deviner comme une pointe de regret dans cette dernière phrase.{/n}

languages.text: "Kanalizasyon tanklarında toplanan kalıntı, o kadar az miktarda ki kaydetmeye bile değmez. Eğer ki gemi kaynaklarının gerçekten suistimal edilmesi gibi bir husustan bahsetseydik dâhil olan herkesi hâlihazırda cezalandırmıştım Lord Kaptan." {n}Son cümle, hafif bir pişmanlık tınısı taşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The amount of residue accumulated in the drainage tanks was so laughably small that it was not even worth recording. If there were any real misappropriation of the ship's resources happening here, I would have already punished those involved, Lord Captain." {n}The last sentence carries a faint note of regret.{/n}
